amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Miller (CA) amendment, specifying that the prohibition against the importation, sale, and distribution of Cuban cigars should only be lifted when the Cuban government adopts specified democratic reforms.

action.text: Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Diaz-Balart to the Miller (CA) amendment (A035).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Diaz-Balart amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
